scripts.dev: npx tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && cp src/snarky.d.ts dist/node/snarky.d.ts
scripts.build: rimraf ./dist/node && npx tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && cp -r src/node_bindings dist/node/_node_bindings && node src/build/buildNode.js && cp src/snarky.d.ts dist/node/snarky.d.ts
scripts.build:test: rimraf ./dist/test && npx tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && cp -r src/node_bindings dist/test/_node_bindings && cp src/snarky.d.ts dist/test/snarky.d.ts
scripts.serve:web: cp src/chrome_bindings/server.js src/chrome_bindings/index.html dist/web && node dist/web/server.js
scripts.prepublish:node: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node src/build/buildNode.js
scripts.prepublish:both: npm run prepublish:web && npm run prepublish:node
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepublish:web && npm run prepublish:node
scripts.bootstrap: npm run build && node src/build/extractJsooMethods.cjs && npm run build
scripts.test: for f in ./src/**/*.test.ts; do NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest $f || exit 1; done
scripts.e2e:prepare-server: npm run build:examples && (cp -rf dist/examples dist/web || :) && node src/build/e2eTestsBuildHelper.js && cp -rf src/chrome_bindings/index.html src/chrome_bindings/server.js tests/artifacts/html/*.html tests/artifacts/javascript/*.js dist/web
